content:
Check:
  all:
    - name: ACTARMCD
      operator: non_empty
    - name: ACTARMCD
      operator: is_not_contained_by
      value: $ta_armcd
Core:
  Id: CORE-000208
  Version: '1'
  Status: Published
Description: Trigger error when study does not use multi-stage arm assignments and
  ACTARMCD ^= null, and ACTARMCD is not in TA.ARMCD
Operations:
  - domain: TA
    id: $ta_armcd
    name: ARMCD
    operator: distinct
Outcome:
  Message: ACTARMCD is not in in TA.ARMCD
  Output Variables:
    - ACTARMCD
Rule Type: Record Data
Sensitivity: Record
Authorities:
  - Organization: CDISC
    Standards:
      - Name: SDTMIG
        Version: '3.4'
        References:
          - Origin: SDTM and SDTMIG Conformance Rules
            Rule Identifier:
              Id: CG0512
              Version: '1'
            Version: '2.0'
            Citations:
              - Cited Guidance: With the exception of studies which use multi-stage
                  Arm assignments, must be a value of ARMCD in the Trial Arms Dataset.
                  If the subject was not assigned to an Arm or followed a course not
                  described by any planned Arm, ACTARMCD is null and ARMNRS is populated.
                Document: IG v3.4
                Item: Specification
                Section: '5.2'
Scope:
  Classes:
    Include:
      - SPECIAL-PURPOSE
  Domains:
    Include:
      - DM

json.Description: Trigger error when study does not use multi-stage arm assignments and ACTARMCD ^= null, and ACTARMCD is not in TA.ARMCD

Outcome.Message: ACTARMCD is not in in TA.ARMCD

Citations.Cited_Guidance: With the exception of studies which use multi-stage Arm assignments, must be a value of ARMCD in the Trial Arms Dataset. If the subject was not assigned to an Arm or followed a course not described by any planned Arm, ACTARMCD is null and ARMNRS is populated.
